subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] A suggestion for less hostility

I agree, If you don't like what somebody says, just push delete.=C2=A0 Ther=
e are so many
other things going on in the world to get upset about.=C2=A0 =
You just attract more negativity.
=C2=A0


IS THIS WHERE YOU LIVE? 
"No, I =
live in heaven, and my affections
are there. I just borrow this shack while=

waiting for my ride home."

--- On Tue, 8/24/10, Zack Widup <w9sz.zack@gma=
il.com> wrote:


From: Zack Widup <w9sz.zack@...>
Subject: Re: [EVP-I=
TC] A suggestion for less hostility
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Tuesd=
ay, August 24, 2010, 9:39 AM


=C2=A0 




Yes, I am. I try to stay objecti=
ve and I've read your past e-mails and honestly, I think a lot of people ar=
e reading things into what you post that I do not see. I do not understand =
the hostility that is being flung at you. People are misunderstanding you t=
remendously for some reason.
=C2=A0
This does not bode well ...
=C2=A0
Zack=



On Tue, Aug 24, 2010 at 9:26 AM, Rj <rasterer@...> wrote:


=C2=A0=
 







I can see you're not in favor of this suggestion for a more peacef=
ul group, though I don't understand why,

Is anyone else with me on this?

=

--- On Tue, 8/24/10, Fransen, Debbie <debbie.fransen@...> wrote:


F=
rom: Fransen, Debbie <debbie.fransen@...>
Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] A su=
ggestion for less hostility
To: "'EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com'" <EVP-ITC@yahoog=
roups.com>
Date: Tuesday, August 24, 2010, 7:16 AM 



=C2=A0 


that would=
 be fine, if you didn't piss Frank off....... But you do.....
AND THAT IS N=
OT OKAY.....
The same thing will happen when you do it again....
So what's =
the point in you being here.



From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-I=
TC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of rasterer
Sent: Tuesday, August 24, 2010 10=
:08 AM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EVP-ITC] A suggestion for less=
 hostility


=C2=A0 


I expect none of us like all the recent attacks, ins=
ults, accusations, threats, hurting of feelings, and attempts to piss peopl=
e off. 

Can I suggest we stick to the purpose of the group: "the discussio=
n, promotion, and developemnt of Electronic Voice Phenomenon, and Instrumen=
tal Transcommunication methods and technologies as used in the communicatio=
n with spirit, and other entities."

And that we go with Frank's philosophy=
 "just take the approach, try different methods, see what works."

No more =
threats. No name calling, insults, or accusations. Just try to keep a posit=
ive group attitude, be open that not everyone believes what everyone else d=
oes, and that's ok?
